At once on the front page! I will be the guest of Jeudi bonus in a few moments #jeprtbf
I am addressing you to make you aware of my decision in view of the upcoming presidential election
Public accounts have been cleaned up. I wanted our social model to be strengthened and expanded
I pushed forward the freedoms, the equality between the couples was strengthened. I modernized our democracy with territorial reform
The commitment I made was to bring down unemployment. I made sure to help hiring. The results are coming.
I have engaged our armies in the world to protect ourselves, to fight against terrorism.
In this context I wanted to maintain national cohesion
I have only one regret and it is to have proposed the deprivation of nationality. I thought she could unite us, she divided us
I carry a balance sheet and I assure all the responsibility. In five months you will have to make a choice for our country
The greatest danger is protectionism, it is confinement, which would be a disaster for French workers
As President of the Republic I have to run the state. As a socialist, I can not bring myself to the dispersion of the left
I am only animated by the best interests of the country. Experience has brought me the necessary humility in my task
"There has been an intrabell agreement on CETA, the fact that the Prime Minister does not apply it is not worthy" #jeprtbf https://t.co/wCKs1bDPf4
Also, I decided not to be a candidate for the renewal of my mandate
